Class BlueSteel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BlueSteel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BoardStyle

    public class BlueSteel
extends java.lang.Object
implements BoardStyle
    This is a board style that displays greyish blue colors with rounded rectangles for most elements, as well as displaying a 2.5d shadow for some elements.
    Date Created: 11/07/2012
    Date Updated: 11/15/2012
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

        x - the x coordinate to draw at
        y - the y coordinate to draw at
        selected - boolean if this label so also draw a player selection graphic.
        addition - boolean if this label's dimension based positioning should be added to x and y, or subtracted from them.
